1.name: Posting invocation Point
1.description: Control the point in which the posting is performed.

3.name: Inteface Selection
3.description: Select the relevant interface for Posting

4.name: Suspense Account
4.description: Debit the customer and credit to a suspense account

5.name: Posting Type Selection
5.description: Control which Posting entries are created at this point of Posting invocation

6.name: Posting Request content
6.description: Control which Posting entries are included in a request

7.name: Reverse Posting
7.description: Reverse the posting that was already done.

8.name: Interface Wait Behavior
8.description: Control whether the payment waits for a response or not.

9.name: Interface Inactive behavior
9.description: Control cases when the interface in Inactive

13.name: Transaction Code
13.description: Assign a Transaction Code for each Posting entry
